formula: a(n) ~ n! * 4 * ((-1)^n + exp(2*arctan(Pi/2))) / ((4 + Pi^2) * exp(arctan(Pi/2)) * arctan(Pi/2)^(n+1)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 23 2015
